meanings.definition: Not subject to time or temporal constraints.
meanings.sent1: The concept of nontemporals ideas fascinated the students in philosophy class.
meanings.sent2: The artist's nontemporals paintings seemed to transcend time itself.
meanings.sent3: The nontemporals clock in the movie only showed the same hour, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her nontemporals beauty was like a timeless painting in a museum.
meanings.sent5: The nontemporals nature of the ancient ruins left visitors in awe.

meanings.definition: Things that exist outside of time.
meanings.sent1: The philosopher pondered the existence of nontemporals beyond our understanding.
meanings.sent2: Legends speak of mythical creatures that are said to be nontemporals.
meanings.sent3: In the fantasy novel, the hero discovered a hidden realm of nontemporals.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky seemed like distant nontemporals watching over the world.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was believed to hold the power of nontemporals.
